title: Rishikesh Riverfront Escape with Daily All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Nestled within a sprawling reserved forest with the mighty Ganges gently flowing by, Atali Ganga Rishikesh is an idyllic riverfront retreat, only a two-hour drive from Jolly Grant Airport - Dehradun (DED). A seven-hour drive from New Delhi and an hour's drive from Rishikesh town, the tranquil three-acre property is enveloped by natural splendour and emanates a chic charm amid rugged surroundings. Cosy up in the quaint cottages, take a dip in the pool, stretch out with some soulful yoga, pamper yourself at the Aum Spa or simply, feast on the gorgeous food spread with daily all-inclusive meals at White Water Café.

Be it solace-seeking or adventure-loving, as India’s first and only ‘Activotel’, Atali Ganga Rishikesh will implore with a host of activities like rafting, wall climbing, mountain biking, hiking, kayaking and astronomy. Spend your days rejuvenating in the ‘Yoga Capital of the World’ or take things up by a notch and indulge in thrilling activities that will get your adrenaline pumping.
offer_address: Milestone 30, Rishikesh-Badrinath Road, Tehri Garhwal, Rishikesh, Uttarakhand 249192 India

title: Adventurous Rishikesh Stay with All-Inclusive Dining & Daily Activities
description:
Hidden within a lush forest, overlooking the mighty Ganges River and just 30km from the holy town of Rishikesh, is Atali Ganga. Your personal gateway to the great outdoors, this secluded paradise offers amazing adventures including river rafting, hiking and biking. Perfect for both solitude-seekers and adventure-lovers, Atali Ganga promises a Himalayan experience like no other.

Enjoy all-inclusive meals (daily breakfast, lunch and dinner), daily morning and evening tea or coffee with cookies, daily campfire evenings with snacks, two scheduled activities per day with shared transfers (river rafting, kayaking, guided hikes, wall climbing and more), and complimentary Wi-Fi.

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged five years and under) stays free with all meals.
offer_address: Milestone 30, Rishikesh-Badrinath Road, Tehri Garhwal, Rishikesh, Uttarakhand 249192

title: Chic Riverfront Rishikesh Escape with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & Ganga Aarti Experience
description:
Immerse yourself in serenity at Lemon Tree Premier Rishikesh, an exclusive vegetarian sanctuary nestled in one of India's most sacred cities. This exquisite retreat, perched on the banks of the majestic Ganges, is conveniently located just a short drive from Dehradun's Jolly Grant Airport (a 35-minute drive) and New Delhi. Revel in unparalleled views of the tranquil Ganges and the awe-inspiring Himalayan foothills, all while indulging in the modern luxuries of this stunning hotel.

Lemon Tree Premier Rishikesh, with its private ghat, seamlessly blends the spiritual essence of Rishikesh with its own refined charm. Whether you seek rejuvenation, adrenaline-pumping water adventures, breathtaking Himalayan vistas, or a journey toward enlightenment, this upscale, alcohol-free, and purely vegetarian retreat promises an unforgettable experience.
offer_address: Shesdhara, Laxman Jhula Rd, Tapovan, Rishikesh, Uttarakhand 249201 India

title: Rishikesh Riverfront Escape in the Heart of the Himalayas with All-Inclusive Meals
description:
Hidden within a lush forest, overlooking the mighty Ganges River and just 30km from the holy town of Rishikesh, is Atali Ganga. A joyful seven-hour drive from Delhi takes you into the middle of a reserved forest to your peaceful holiday abode, and your personal gateway to the great outdoors. This secluded paradise offers amazing adventures including river rafting, hiking and biking, and was stamped with a 2022 Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice award.

Perfect for both solitude-seekers and adventure-lovers, Atali Ganga promises a Himalayan experience like no other. Fill your days with gentle yoga and scenic walks or take things up a notch with a range of exciting activities, from river rafting to kayaking.
offer_address: Milestone 30, Rishikesh-Badrinath Road, Tehri Garhwal, Rishikesh, Uttarakhand 249192 India

title: Upscale Rishikesh Stay Overlooking the River Ganges with Daily Breakfast
description:
Stumble upon peace and tranquility by the Ganges at Rishikesh's Lemon Tree Premier Hotel, a premium retreat in one of India's holiest cities. Sitting pretty on the banks of the Ganges, this idyllic hotel is easily accessible from Jolly Grant Airport and major cities, including Delhi.

Treat yourself to spectacular views of the Himalayan foothills and serene Ganges while enjoying contemporary luxury at this beautiful hotel. Boasting a private ghat, Lemon Tree Premier brings the calming spiritual vibes of Rishikesh right to your doorstep. No matter what you are seeking - total rejuvenation, thrilling water adventures, panoramic Himalayan views or even nirvana - you are bound to find it at this upscale, alcohol-free and pure vegetarian retreat.
offer_address: Shesdhara, Laxman Jhula Rd, Tapovan, Rishikesh, Uttarakhand 249201 India

title: Riverfront Rishikesh Stay in the Heart of the Himalayas with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Hidden within a lush forest, overlooking the mighty Ganges River and just 30km from the holy town of Rishikesh, is Atali Ganga. Your personal gateway to the great outdoors, this secluded paradise offers amazing adventures including river rafting, hiking and biking. Perfect for both solitude-seekers and adventure-lovers, Atali Ganga promises a Himalayan experience like no other.

Fill your days with gentle yoga and scenic walks or take things up a notch with a range of exciting activities, from river rafting to kayaking.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- All-inclusive meals: daily buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner, daily morning and evening tea/coffee with cookies, and daily soft drinks/juices with evening snacks (five snacks between 7pm and 8pm)
- Make the most of your stay with a 15% discount on additional dining and soft drinks
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged 10 years and under) stays free on a hideaway bed with all inclusions.

**Activities Upgrade:** Choose this fun package and enjoy two scheduled activities per person, per day, with shared transfers between activities included. Choose from river rafting, wall climbing, mountain biking, yoga, spa and sauna (only valid for guests 18 years and above), guided hikes and kayaking.
offer_address: Milestone 30, Rishikesh-Badrinath Road, Tehri Garhwal, Rishikesh, Uttarakhand 249192
